On August 28, 2025, On August 28, 2025,Infosysannounced a significant corporate development with its strategic collaboration with Mastercard .

Infosys entered into a partnership with Mastercard to scale cross-border payments. The collaboration is focused on enhancing access for financial institutions to Mastercard Move, Mastercard's portfolio of money movement capabilities.

Key details of the collaboration include:

Infosys will integrate its digital banking suite, Finacle (from its subsidiary EdgeVerve Systems), with Mastercard Move.

This integration is designed to provide financial institutions with a more efficient and faster pathway to access Mastercard Move's capabilities.

It is expected to reduce the typical implementation time and resourcing needed for such integration projects.
